attributes.action: MPS: Stop shouting and jeering like boorish animals in the House of Commons.
attributes.additional_details: Today's Spending Review (25/11/15) was a disgusting example of how our MPs act like children in the House of Commons. This petition is not aimed at any one party or any one politician: it is directed at all of them.
attributes.background: Our MPs work for us. If, like me, you are unimpressed with their behaviour in the office, please sign my petition to make them stop shouting, jeering and acting like boorish animals when debating in the House of Commons. They're embarrassing us.
